ingredients.ingredient: 1 tablespoon Cajun seasoning, divided, or to taste
1 large green bell pepper, diced, divided
1 tablespoon tomato paste, or more to taste
2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green pepper and onion
⅛ teaspoon Cajun-style crab boil seasoning, or to taste

cookingTips: Make a dark roux by cooking flour and butter together over medium heat, stirring constantly until it reaches a deep chocolate brown color
Add okra late in cooking to avoid excessive sliminess; it acts as a natural thickener
Layer flavors by adding ingredients in stages: start with the holy trinity (onion, celery, pepper), build the roux, then add liquids
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Traditional gumbo relies on a well-developed roux as its base. How would you know when your roux has reached the right color and consistency?
